questions.question: Who is the current President of India?
questions.solution: As of now, the current President of India is Droupadi Murmu.

questions.question: Which article of the Indian Constitution deals with the Right to Equality?
questions.solution: Article 14 of the Indian Constitution deals with the Right to Equality.

questions.question: Who appoints the Prime Minister of India?
questions.solution: The President of India appoints the Prime Minister.

questions.question: What is the maximum number of members in the Rajya Sabha?
questions.solution: The Rajya Sabha can have a maximum of 250 members.

questions.question: Which amendment of the Indian Constitution is known as the 'Mini Constitution'?
questions.solution: The 42nd Amendment is known as the 'Mini Constitution'.

questions.question: What is the tenure of the Rajya Sabha members?
questions.solution: Members of the Rajya Sabha serve a tenure of 6 years.

questions.question: Who can dissolve the Lok Sabha?
questions.solution: The Prime Minister can advise the President to dissolve the Lok Sabha.

questions.question: Which state has the largest number of seats in the Lok Sabha?
questions.solution: Uttar Pradesh has the largest number of seats in the Lok Sabha.

questions.question: Who is the head of the state government in India?
questions.solution: The Chief Minister is the head of the state government.

questions.question: Which article of the Indian Constitution provides for the abolition of untouchability?
questions.solution: Article 17 of the Indian Constitution provides for the abolition of untouchability.
